alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Stillwater; Sweet Grass; Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 24 at 4:20PM MDT until June 24 at 8:45PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central and south central Montana, including the following counties, in central Montana, Golden Valley and Wheatland. In south central Montana, Stillwater and Sweet Grass. * WHEN...Until 815 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 416 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated 0.5 to 1.25 inches of rainfall has fallen along a slow moving line of showers and thunderstorms over the past hour. This is in an area that saw excessive rainfall over the past 36 hours. The ground is saturated and most of this rainfall will runoff. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Shawmut. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Do not drive on or attempt to cross flooded roads, find an alternate route. Roads and driveways may be damaged or washed out in places.

area.areaDesc: Golden Valley; Stillwater; Sweet Grass; Wheatland
